title: How can I stop the purple Tracker Information pop-ups that appear every time I open a new webpage?
content:
Hi,

Since recent updates to Firefox I get a purple pop-up listing Trackers at the bottom right of my screen every time I open a new webpage. I'm happy with my PC security settings and have good protection software running - but this pop-up listing Trackers is becoming a nuisance.

Is there a way to stop Firefox displaying the Tracker notification pop-ups whilst still intercepting and blocking them in accordance with my security settings?

I see that other users have asked the same question, but it does not seem to have been answered yet.

Thanks,

Peter
creator: PeterKinloch

title: Images fail to load in Nextdoor

title: Mozilla Take Too Much Time When Browse a Particular Page on A Website?
content: As I am frequent travel so I usually visit travel sites for updates and inquiry. Recently, I came across a webpage for inquiring flight PNR status of my air ticket which takes too much time too load on Firefox. But when I opened that webpage on chrome it loaded within a second. Why I am facing this issue? Is there any issue with my internet provider or browser?
creator: ryanrajpoot

title: Mancato accesso al sito scribd.com
content:
Sia su desktop che su android, Firefox non apre il sito scribd.com dando il messaggio di errore "Impossibile contattare il server"; cliccando sull'icona accanto all'indirizzo web, compare un pop-up che riporta: "La connessione con questo sito non è sicura". Cliccando poi sulle ulteriori informazioni compare un'altro pop-up da cui pare che il sito non supporti la connessione crittata (per maggiori dettagli vedi le immagini allegate). Con Microsoft Edge invece non ho il minimo problema e posso accedere al sito normalmente con connessione crittata (vedi ultima immagine). Ho già provveduto a modificare i parametri di IPv6 e prefetch del dns secondo quanto consigliato dalla pagina di aiuto "I siti web vengono caricati con altri programmi ma non con Firefox" così come ho provato l'avvio in modalità provvisoria ma in entrambi i casi senza risultato. Il problema è particolarmente seccante perché su android anche l'app (che probabilmente si appoggia al browser predefinito ovvero Firefox) segnala erroneamente che non sono connesso ad internet. Resto in attesa di una soluzione, grazie.

PS: per cortesia evitate di fare riferimento alle pagine di aiuto perché le ho già consultate senza risultato
creator: antonio.chiari

title: Whatsapp Web Hesap Otomatik Açılmıyor
content:
Merhaba,

Whatsapp Web'e girişte sıkıntı yaşıyorum. Whatsapp hesabım açık kalması gerektiği halde tarayıcıyı her kapatıp açtığımda bağlantım kopuyor ve "lütfen bilgisayarınızın internet bağlantısını kontrol edin" benzeri bir mesaj alıyorum, internet kesinlikle bağlı olduğu halde. Tarayıcıyı tekrar kapatıp açtığımda bu sefer giriş yapmak için tekrar karekod taramamı istiyor. Benzer bir soruna verilen cevaptan çerez ve geçmiş ayarlarımı kontrol ettim, ayarların hepsi olması gerektiği gibi. Çerezler silinmiyor ve geçmiş kaydediliyor. Bir türlü hesabın açık kalmasını sağlayamıyorum.

Son birkaç gündür 2 ayrı cihazda bu problemi yaşıyorum.

Yardımcı olabilirseniz çok mutlu olacağım. Teşekkürler.
creator: bilgetuncel17

title: "The connection has timed out" error message on every page I try to visit, but works fine with other browsers
content:
No matter what website I try to visit, it gives me that error message saying the connection timed out. Yet any other browser I use, works completely properly. Is this due to a recent update? It was working fine until the update happened. Everything was working fine before.

This is version 104.0.1 by the way.

title: "Change Picture From Clipboard" in MS Office not work with Firefox
content: In MS Office 365 there's a feature that you can change a picture from clipboard directly (shown in the attached image). It worked with Firefox before. I can copy a picture from a webpage to clipboard and change existing picture with it from clipboard. Currently this feature doesn't work with Firefox, the menu item is grey, but fine with MS Edge. But I can still paste picture from clipboard by pressing Ctrl+V. I cannot tell which side is the source of problem so I asked this question on both Firefox and MS Community.

title: A ServiceWorker passed a promise to FetchEvent.respondWith() that resolved with non-Response value ‘undefined’.
content:
Hey there,

For the last 2 days I have been experiencing issues with soundcloud and linear.

After looking into the console I noticed that there are a lot of errors, and they look the same.

Failed to load ‘https://a-v2.sndcdn.com/assets/1-c3c6190a.js’. A ServiceWorker passed a promise to FetchEvent.respondWith() that resolved with non-Response value ‘undefined’.

I installed https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/block-website/ about that time, but I tried to disable the extension, it did not help. I also tried troubleshoot mode, did not help either.

Soundcloud works in a private window with all extensions enabled, even block-website.

Any ideas?

Thank you
creator: bence1204

title: Unable to do secure login login to a website with Firefox.
content:
I have Firefox v104.0.2 and am running a Windows 10 computer 64 bit. When attempting to log into my Edward Jones financial account, every item on the web page responds to me except secure login. It worked properly yesterday 9/5/2022. I restarted my computer, cleared cache, etc and I am running a VPN. When I could not login I contacted Edward Jones and they said that issue happens once in a while. I am able to get the site to work with a VPN and Chrome without issue. Why am I having problems on my Firefox browser? Any help would be appreciated.

Brett Fairchild
creator: brettbrendablake

title: Sent tabs missing
content:
I was away from my desktop for a few months. During that time, I sent a number of tabs from Firefox on Android to my desktop. I've just logged into my desktop, updated Firefox, and synced, and 0 tabs came through. There were some errors in about:sync-log, which I don't see a way to attach, but here are some representative lines: 1662515573549 Sync.Status DEBUG Status.service: success.status_ok => error.login.failed 1662515586056 Sync.Telemetry ERROR Notification for engine tabs but it isn't current

Is there any way to get those tabs back?
creator: haelduksf
